0.01.name: wordpress/convers8
0.01.description: This plugin enables users to login and connect one or more social network accounts to your Wordpress blog. We support the following networks: Facebook, Hyves, Twitter and LinkedIn. After installation, you have to register for a Convers8 API key also at convers8.eu.
